articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/HorsetalkNZ
articles.title: Pattern of north to south extinction in hipparions confirmed - Horsetalk.co.nz - Horsetalk
articles.description: Hipparions went extinct in Europe by 2.5 million years ago, in China by 1 million years ago, and in Sub-Saharan Africa 600,000 to 400,000 years ago.
articles.content:
New Hipparion ambiguum fossil teeth discovered at the lower archaeological levels at Ain Boucherit. Photo: Made et al.
North African three-toed horses gradually became extinct in the Old World from … [+2638 chars]

articles.author: Doina Chiacu and Alexander Marrow
articles.title: ‘Massive invasion force ready to attack’: NATO rejects Putin’s troop pullback claims - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: NATO may use new battle groups in central and south-eastern Europe to guard against a “new normal” of Russia using military coercion to contest sovereignty.
articles.content:
He said all indications were that Russia was maintaining a massive invasion force ready to attack.
We have not seen any withdrawal of Russian forces. And of course, that contradicts the message of d… [+4259 chars]

articles.author: Sinéad Baker
articles.title: Russia claims it has no immediate plans to attack Ukraine: 'Wars in Europe rarely start on a Wednesday' - Yahoo News
articles.description: Russia has repeatedly denied plans to attack or invade Ukraine, but other nations are skeptical and warn that an invasion could happen soon.
articles.content:
• Russia denied a report that it plans to attack Ukraine soon, perhaps as soon as Wednesday.
  • Russia's envoy to the EU told Die Welt: "Wars in Europe rarely start on a Wednesday."
